snippet: England and Wales paid a heavy price for the November defeats when they were put in a tough pool with Australia in the draw for the 2015 rugby World Cup on Monday.
abstract: Draw for 2015 Rugby World Cup pits Australia against England and Wales.
lead_paragraph: England and Wales paid a heavy price for the November defeats when they were put in a tough pool with Australia in the draw for the 2015 rugby World Cup on Monday.

headline.seo: England Drawn With Wales and Australia in Rugby World Cup Group
headline.main: England Drawn With Wales and Australia in Rugby World Cup Group
